forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early, then sunny by the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain this morning...then becoming sunny by afternoon. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. Scattered thunderstorms late. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
